name: Spațiu Mioritic 02
description: Spațiu Mioritic(RO) / Mioritic Space (EN): Lucian Blaga’s (poet and philosopher) concept of the Mioritic Space is a philosophical explanation that defines the Romanian spiritual universe represented by the Romanian geographic space: the land where the mountains and the valleys alternate and create a perfect environment for shepherding. He considered the Romanian soul in solidarity with this spatial horizon. // This is the second photo of this series.// Instagram: @m.art.on & Twitter: @AnielaMarton
